#summary La.f - A virtual logic analyzer for the propeller
#labels v2.6

http://code.google.com/p/propforth/downloads/list

Uses 2 cogs, the currently running cog and the next PropForth cog. Use TAB to go between fields, cursor up/down to change values, cursor right/left to change sensitivity / position.

Very useful tool for debugging code which twiddles io pins.
